about_the_game:
'The Mice Plight' is a roguelike that blends a turn-based tactical combat with cards. Play as a mouse trapped in a dark forest guarded by cats, birds, reptiles and all kind of mouse predators. You need to find a way to escape from this hell!

Survive In A Dangerous Environment

The predators are always watching. They filled your path with all kind of traps. Watch your step and don't let them catch you.

Outsmart The Predators

When you're cornered, all that's left is to fight back. Pick your abilities before each encounter to tailor your strategy.

What Doesn't Kill You Makes You Stronger

Defeat the predators to steal their skills and enhance the ones you already have.

Core Features

  • Hex-based tactics
  • Procedurally generated dungeons filled with traps, events, secrets, enemies...
  • 4 Biomes
  • 35 Unique Predators
  • +200 cards
  • 4 Bosses
  • 1 Final Boss

short_description: Escape a treacherous labyrinthine prison by outsmarting guards in tactical card-based battles. Pick your abilities before each encounter, tailoring your strategy. Defeat guards to steal their skills, navigate deadly traps, and unleash your cunning to secure your freedom.
